Comments_List: -great knowledge about self-teaching, React, Firebase, and the hottest industry tools

strengths: we learned everything independently and by collaborating with one another -- and since we picked our own projects we got very excited and invested in them! 
weaknesses: really, none -- loved it!
YES - if you have a project you'd like to work on, you should definitely pursue a directed reading like the Modern Development Stack :)
